Title: Mvc Dependency
Description: Mvc Dependency is the smaller better looking sibling of Client Dependency. There's no standing on your head to support legacy Web Forms, just plain simple conventions that put you in control of your resources.

Project Description
Mvc Dependency is the smaller better looking sibling of Client Dependency. There's no standing on your head to support legacy Web Forms, just plain simple conventions that put you in control of your resources.
